chart.description: Heatmap of Warehouse 1h Avg Total Query Time by Warehouse
chart.name: Warehouse Load heatmap
chart.programText:
A = data('snowflake.queued_provisioning_time.sum', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['WAREHOUSE_NAME']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('snowflake.queued_repair_time.sum', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['WAREHOUSE_NAME']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('snowflake.queued_overload_time.sum', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['WAREHOUSE_NAME']).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (A+B+C).sum(by=['WAREHOUSE_NAME']).mean(over='1h').publish(label='D')

options.markdown:
Monitor Logins


Counted as 24h Sum

publishLabelOptions.displayName: snowflake.total_elapsed_time.sum - Mean by DATABASE_NAME,SCHEMA_NAME,QUERY_TYPE - Mean(24h) - Top 5
publishLabelOptions.label: F

chart.name: Login Failure Rate
chart.programText:
C = data('snowflake.logins.total', filter=filter('IS_SUCCESS', '*'), rollup='sum').sum().sum(over='24h').publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = data('snowflake.logins.total', filter=filter('IS_SUCCESS', 'NO'), rollup='sum').sum().sum(over='24h').publish(label='D', enable=False)
E = ((D/C)*100).publish(label='E')

chart.name: Total Storage bytes
chart.programText:
A = data('snowflake.storage.stage_bytes.total', resolution=3600000).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('snowflake.storage.storage_bytes.total', resolution=3600000).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('snowflake.storage.failsafe_bytes.total', resolution=3600000).publish(label='C', enable=False)
E = (A+B+C).publish(label='E')

options.markdown: Monitor Storage

chart.description: Spilled bytes to Local + Remote (1h Sum)
chart.name: Total Spilled bytes
